extension.title: تعیین جنسیت
extension.description: Adds an option in users profile to select their gender.
extension.author: Gizzmo
extension.note: If you wish to use your own gender images, just drop them in the /img directory with the filename 'gender-#'. Replacing # with 1 for male, 2 for female, and 0 for Unspecified. This extension can determin if its gif, png, or jpg image.
